snippet.title: Hellgineers Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now at https://johanpeitz.itch.io/hellgineers

Help the minions of the underworld across bubbling pools of lava with rickety bridges and non-regulated constructions. Will you go for the easiest route, or test your skills and aim for the coveted skulls? Return to completed challenges to perfect your builds!

Hellgineers is a content packed game made in pico8 with hours of gameplay. Get max rank on all the challenges, or just relax and play around with the fun physics and quirky characters.

Subscribe to my Patreon for more games like this!

Design/Art/Code: Johan Peitz (https://www.patreon.com/johanpeitz)  
Music/Sound: Vav (https://twitter.com/VAVMUSICMAGIC)
Font: Somepx (https://somepx.itch.io)

Many thanks to my supporters on Patreon for making it possible to keep making games like this. Subscribers get each game cheaper as soon as it is out (plus source code, early access, and all that jazz)!
